title: Berfunkle
creator_credit: Bill Murray, Stu Knickerbocker and Portafilms
brief_description: Introduces the problems involved in communication; in use of words as symbols of things and concepts. This animated film considers the problems of verbal communication as it follows the humorous misadventures of a poor soul trying to find the exact meaning of the word “Berfunkle”.
